_comments.enabled: Set to false to completely disable the plugin
_comments.dryRun: Set to true to see what would be translated without actually translating
_comments.debug: Set to true to enable debug logging (useful for troubleshooting)
_comments.disabledPackageManagers: List of package managers to NOT translate (e.g., ['npm', 'yarn'])

disable_npm_only.description: Only translate yarn, pnpm, and bun commands, leave npm alone

dry_run_mode.description: See what would be translated without actually translating

debug_mode.description: Enable debug logging to see what's happening
